name: PlanetFarmer!
description:
Rotate the world with the left and right keys (or touch/click the left or right half of the screen). Walk over the little dirt mounds to plant a seed and then expose the seeds to the sun to watch them grow, but be careful because too much soon will kill your crop! Your plant will turn yellow (dry) after a couple of seconds in the sun (after it has bloomed), and red (burnt) if left in the sun too long!

You get 0 points for a red crop, and different points will be awarded for dry/good crops (in a future build). Time limits, random spawns, and more to come! Drop an idea in the comments if you like!
